caption.p: Percent of use reports mentioned for each infection type treated with medicinal plants by the Karen in Thailand. Darker blue color and larger infection type area indicate higher number of use reports. Plant families mentioned under an infection type area are those with high CI values and the number in the parentheses after the family names indicates the CI value of the family. The numbers of plants in the lower right corners of the areas represent total numbers of plant species used for treatments of the infection types.
